short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: iZiTest is a Chrome extension that making tests your website easier.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: iZiTest is a extension chrome which allows you to record and playback you testing scenarios by connecting with your account application izitest.io
